text: We get a colour option that is new to the MacBook Pro (name)
full-pick-text: We get a colour option that is new to the MacBook Pro (name)
notes:
• This was originally "new in name or hue", but some questioning of what a new hue would be resulted in relying solely on a new colour name.
  • Came true two years later... with "space black" replacing "space gray" in name at least.
